title: 求会解决的大神进来看看！！关于别人进人家服务器出现秒退
author: mikumiku233
txt_content:
表示人家开服了，他前段时间还可以进来，但是最近几天，突然进不了，进来，就自动掉，而且他进来，人家的服务器就出现错误……
错误如下
07:32PM [INFO] Read timed out
07:32PM [SEVERE] java.net.SocketException: Socket closed
07:32PM [SEVERE] at java.net.SocketOutputStream.sockeWrite(Unknown Source)
07:32PM [SEVERE] at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flushBuffer(Unkown Source)
07:32PM [SEVERE] at java.io.BufferedOutputStream.flush(Unkown Source)
07:32PM [SEVERE] at java.io.DataOutputStream.flush(Unkown Source)
07:32PM [SEVERE] at net.minecraft.server.NetworkWriterThread.run(SourceFile:103)

（表示其余人进来不会出现秒退……但是，他进来……杯具）
